amendment.description: To clarify the provisions relating to the jurisdiction of the Department of Homeland Security.

action.text: Amendment SA 3989 as previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3989 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3989 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10621-10622; text: CR S10621) To clarify the provisions relating to the jurisdiction of the Department of Homeland Security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3989 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3989 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 3981.
